name: Taj Mahal
address: Dharmapuri, Forest Colony, Tajganj, Agra, Uttar Pradesh 282001
features: 17th-century, Mughal-style, marble mausoleum with minarets, a mosque & famously symmetrical gardens.

name: Gateway of India
address: Apollo Bandar, Colaba, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400001
features: Grand, Indo-Saracenic-style, 26m-tall triumphal stone arch, built on the waterfront in 1924.

name: Qutub Minar
address: Seth Sarai, Mehrauli, New Delhi, Delhi 110030
features: 73m tapering tower built in 1193 by Qutab-ud-din Aibak after defeat of Delhi's last Hindu kingdom.

name: Wonderla Amusement Park
address: 28th Km, Mysore Rd, Bengaluru, Karnataka 562109
features: Amusement park with roller coasters, a ferris wheel & water rides, plus virtual reality experiences.

name: Agra Fort
address: Agra Fort, Rakabganj, Agra, Uttar Pradesh 282003
features: Richly decorated semi-circular red sandstone fort complex with double ramparts and monuments.

name: India Gate
address: Rajpath, India Gate, New Delhi, Delhi 110001
features: Imposing Arc de Triomphe-style gate commemorating the Indian soliders killed in the First World War.

name: Marine Drive
address: Mumbai, Maharashtra
features: No-frills beach where locals flock to dip Lord Ganesh idols in the sea for Ganesh Visarjan.

name: Humayun's Tomb
address: Humayun's Tomb, Nizamuddin, Nizamuddin East, New Delhi, Delhi 110013
features: Tomb of Humayun, a Mughal Emperor

name: Golden Temple
address: Golden Temple, Golden Temple Rd, Atta Mandi, Katra Ahluwalia, Amritsar Cantt., Punjab 143006
features: Preeminent spiritual site of Sikhism

name: Baga Beach
address: Baga, Goa
features: Popular beach in Goa, famous for water sports

name: Jantar Mantar
address: Connaught Place, Sansad Marg, New Delhi, Delhi 110001
features: 13 architectural astronomy instruments built in 1724 at the orders of Mughal emperor Muhammad Shah.

name: Ramoji Film City
address: Abdullahpurmet, Vijayawada Highway, Hyderabad, Telangana 501512
features: The world's largest film studio offering tours, live shows, on-site theme park and adventure zone.

name: Golconda Fort
address: Khair Complex, Ibrahim Bagh, Hyderabad, Telangana 500008
features: Capital of a kingdom that flourished from the 14th to 16th century, with 87 semi-circular bastions.

name: Birla Mandir
address: Hill Fort Rd, Ambedkar Colony, Khairtabad, Hyderabad, Telangana 500004
features: Imposing, hilltop Hindu temple built of white marble, with towers, shrines and interior carvings.

name: Connaught Place
address: New Delhi, Delhi 110001
features: Connaught Place is a frenetic business and financial hub, centered on a ring of colonnaded Georgian-style buildings with global chain stores, vintage cinemas, bars and Indian restaurants. Stalls at Janpath Market sell saris, embroidered bags and trinkets. The peaceful Sikh temple Gurdwara Bangla Sahib is known for its reflecting pool, and Jantar Mantar is a 1700s observatory with huge astronomical instruments.

name: Charminar
address: Charminar Rd, Char Kaman, Ghansi Bazaar, Hyderabad, Telangana 500002
features: Iconic 16th-century mosque with 4 grand arches, 48m tall minarets and views over the Laad Bazaar.

name: Red Fort
address: Netaji Subhash Marg, Lal Qila, Chandni Chowk, New Delhi, Delhi 110006
features: Landmark 17th-century Mughal fortress built in towering red sandstone, now a complex of museums

name: Tirumala Temple
address: S Mada St, Tirumala, Tirupati, Andhra Pradesh 517504
features: Sprawling, ornate temple complex founded on hills in the 4th century & mentioned in Hindu legends.

name: Cubbon Park
address: Sampangi Rama Nagara, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560001
features: Established in 1870, this vibrant city park has walking paths, landscaped gardens & play areas.

name: Vivekananda Rock Memorial
address: Kanyakumari, Tamil Nadu 629702
features: Sacred monument in honor of a Hindu monk built on a 4-acre rock half a kilmetre out to sea.

name: Nandi Hills
address: Nandi Hills, Karnataka 562103
features: Starting point for heritage trail hike with some man-made steps through forested hills.

name: Lodhi Garden
address: Lodhi Rd, Lodhi Gardens, Lodhi Estate, New Delhi, Delhi 110003
features: A British-era public park featuring ancient tombs, rose & herb gardens, bonsai trees and a lake.

name: Botanic Garden of Indian Republic
address: Capt. Viijyant, Captain Vijyant Thapar Marg, Sector 38, Noida, Uttar Pradesh 201303
features: Sprawling botanical gardens showcasing the region's wide variety of native flora in lush surrounds.

name: Ranthambore National Park
address: Prempura, Rajasthan

name: Mysore Palace
address: Sayyaji Rao Rd, Agrahara, Chamrajpura, Mysuru, Karnataka 570001

name: Paradise Beach
address: Manaveli Rd, Chinna Veerampattinam, Puducherry 605007

address: Fort Vypin, Puthuvype, Kochi, Kerala
features: Views & photo-ops of giant, iconic Chinese style fishing nets suspended from tall bamboo frames.
